summary: So I thought.. I really like the ‘Draco in Lingerie’ drawing I made.. Why not start a series?  To be honest I didn’t really feel...
caption:
So I thought.. I really like the ‘Draco in Lingerie’ drawing I made.. Why not start a series? 

To be honest I didn’t really feel like posting this one since I’m not that satisfied with it. I put way less effort in it compared to the Draco one, but it’s better just to throw it on here than to let it float around my room.

Hope at least some of you enjoy :’)

blog.name: oliivverwood
blog.title: the strongest drug of them all? love.
blog.description: follow backs from @richietczicr, i take requests

body:
and you look so classic

pairing: marcus flint/oliver wood, minor draco malfoy/harry potter, pansy parkinson/hermione granger, ron weasley/blaise zabini, astoria greengrass/ginny weasley

summary: a flintwood take on the song “magic in the hamptons”

-

marcus flint remembered the summer when oliver wood pulled up in his red fucking ferrari in front of the mansion across from his, and suddenly he whirled into a summer with brown hair and brown eyes.alternatively; rich boys and rich girls fall in love over a summer

-

It was a Saturday when Marcus, who’d been glaring at his father’s investment papers, watched as Oliver Wood moved into the empty mansion across from his own family estate.

It was a tall, picturesque household, very elegant, very costly, but if you lived in this neighbourhood, you had cash to blow.

The stranger was in a red Ferrari, his parents in the backseat chatting. They laughed together, looking at their new home. A moving van drove right behind him.

Marcus had set down his coffee. Newcomers were rare. It was too expensive to just move.

No, these were family estates.

He had warm brown hair, and was wearing a blue polo shirt. His sunglasses glinted under the light and he dimpled when his father had clapped him on the back.

Marcus hated him instantly. Marcus didn’t do preppy, spoiled brats. Granted, he was one himself.

He looked at the papers strewn in front of him.

He was earning his funds, earning the right to be a Flint, a real Flint who shook firm hands and met important people and had champagne with his wife at a five-star restaurant on Saturdays.

The stranger was entering his mansion now. Marcus knew he’d see him again soon.

keep reading on ao3

summary: “If you become a curse-breaker as good as you are a troublemaker, I see great success in your career.”

“If you become a curse-breaker as good as you are a troublemaker, I see great success in your career.”

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

|| Art plus nonsense-content blog||
My fanfics break canon deal with it || MC is a Slytherin even tho I am a Ravenclaw || Asra is my bae and The Arcana is my life ||

body:
I have this headcanon…

Where I think Emerald would want to make a slumber party with all her friends (even from other houses) and she’s like “u know what? fuck the rules, I gonna do this anyway”, and then late at night she would just cast Immobulus on her boring roommates, ecxept of Rowan and Jade ‘cus they’re part of the SQUAD, and then sneak everyone inside their room and party hard until morning.

Jade belong to @sungoddessra

blog.name: sweetlialia
blog.title: Lia
blog.description: Mostly HP but non exclusively // Huffelpuff and proud // sometimes I write but I mostly reblog

title: Still Untilted part 13
body:
Previous parts there : Part 1 Part 2 Part 3 Part 4 Part 5 Part 6 Part 7 Part 8 Part 9 Part 10 Part 11 Part 12

NB : i Don’t know a single synonym of “badge” apart from “insignia” so i’ve repeat it a lot of time sorry

As he entered the Great Hall with Nott and a few of their shared friends, Harry realised he hadn’t been the only one staying up late. Most of the Slytherin students wore badges reading Gryffindors hate us all, Not a Death Eater or the forgotten Potter Stinks redo to read Weasley Stinks. Some Hufflepuffs and Ravenclaws had also pinned Not a Death Eater on their school robes.

“Look Harry”, Hermione grabbed him abruptly by the sleeve, pointing out a Hufflepuff student, “it’s my badge! It’s SPEW! But with an S?

-Slytherin I guess.

-Students.” Padma claimed. Parvati, Hermione, Neville and her were the only one Harry had convinced of joining Nott and him for breakfast. “The Society for the Promotion of Students Welfare. I hope you’re not angry with us.

-I find it brilliant actually.

-More popular than spew anyway.” Harry joked. “Is it worn by some Gryffindor?

-I got some for you but no they don’t. Except for Parvati, of course.

-Gin and Ron were in the common room… They didn’t want to hear about it, and they weren’t alone. I think Dean is on some kind of project.

-Is he with or against the Weasley?” Nott asked.

“With, I think. You seem surprise.

-Wasn’t against all Slytherins not so long ago.” He shrugged with the same feign disinterest Harry had seen on Malfoy’s face so many times. “But I don’t see Goldstein with a pins either so. Do you know if Luna wears one?

-She helped me made them. She add something against Narggles in them, at least that what she said.

-Great, we don’t need those right now. Pans and the guys aren’t coming before the first lesson, we should use that time. I want to see more SPSW and less Weasley stinks. Potter, Granger, Longbottom, can I offer you your own badge? I think everyone already know you’re not Death Eaters so let’s keep them for those in need.

-Wait, those in need?

-If everyone wears one, the message would be blurred. It would be everyone against Malfoy, and that’s not what we want.

-Does he know about it?

-He made those, Potter. Not a Death Eater, Weasley Stinks, Gryffindors hate us all, SPSW, they were all his ideas.”

By 10, it became obvious that teachers couldn’t do anything against badges. By 10, they were still some students wearing no badge or blank ones, but they were a minority. The greatest part of Gryffindor and their allies from Hufflepuff and Ravenclaw began to wear Dean’s badges. He hadn’t done things by half. His insignia were brilliantly done, this had to be reckoned. Brutal and cruel, but brilliantly done. Each fifteen seconds a new name appeared on it, a substitute to the previous one who blew up merely second before. Fred Weasley, Remus Lupin, Tonks, Lavender Brown, Colin Creevey, Nigel Wolpert, Albus Dumbledore, Sirius Black and fifty other names popping one after the other.

By 12, Harry locked himself in a toilet stall. 


Thank you for reading !

i’m sorry it’s a small part but my sis got back home

@secretlycrazyhummingbird @nothingsronwithme @eatabus  @ladyseidenlocke @alexandriarenee @cutecactusqueen @joyfulblazestarlightlove @hpotterrloverr

blog.name: ihsnamih
blog.title: The Girl Who Lived. For Harry Potter.

title: The forbidden forest
body:
Strangely, Harry did not cry. He pulled his invisibility cloak closer to himself and walked resolutely across the grounds towards the forbidden forest. As he reached the edge of the forest, he suddenly remembered. He had spied on Snape on his broomstick in there once, a million years ago, when he had still thought Snape to be wrong, and when he used to hate him. He now realised how much Snape had suffered, and why he himself had hated Harry so much. His, Harry’s, eyes were the last thing Snape had seen when he died. With the love of his life gone, he had worked all his life to protect her son. The image of tears leaking down Snape’s eyes, as he had read Lily’s letter and torn away her love flashed in Harry’s mind. He fumbled absentmindedly in the pouch hung around his neck for his mother’s letter and his hand brushed the golden snitch.

He took it out. Knowing fully well what it contained, he touched the snitch to his lips and said – I am about to die… and finally, with a flutter of its silver wings, the snitch opened. Inside it was the black stone that Marvolo had worn on his finger – the resurrection stone. He closed his eyes, turned the stone thrice in his hands and waited.

He sensed rather than heard the movement around him. He opened his eyes. There they were, Lupin, smiling, and looking far younger than Harry had ever seen him. Sirius was there too, looking at Harry with distinct pride. His father stood next to his mother, with arms around her shoulder but Harry’s eyes sought the man who was standing a little apart, with his hooked nose and the curtain of greasy hair around his face. The man too was looking at Harry, and crying. Tears started leaking down Harry’s eyes too and he walked towards him, with his hand held out, as if to touch the man. But as he neared the man, Harry realised, with a sense of bitterness, that he could not touch Snape, who had held out his hands too. He addressed him in a voice heaving with emotion.

“I am sorry… I am so sorry for everything….” Harry said, and he fell forward on his knees and broke down completely. Lily walked towards Snape and hugged him, ‘Thank you so much for looking after my son, you really were my best friend”. James turned towards Snape and said, “I am really, really sorry Severus for everything that I have done to you. You are the bravest man I have ever known.” Sirius and Lupin moved forward and shook Snape’s hand. Snape looked at all of them and smiled, “I am sorry Harry I gave you such a hard time. It was only because I knew, one day, he would have come back and, as much as I could not be hard on Lily’s son, I had to do what was needed of me.”

As he reached the edge of the forest, he suddenly remembered. tags: i tag ron because he was hermione's partner
summary:
Hermione: I can't believe you and Draco made a better potion than us!!
Harry: Ummm...
Hermione: WHAT?
Harry: We stole it from...
body:
Hermione: I can't believe you and Draco made a better potion than us!!
Harry: Ummm...
Hermione: WHAT?
Harry: We stole it from you, because Draco ruined ours adding an ingredient by mistake when I kissed him
Draco: Potter! You're weak! You don't confess your crimes!

summary:
my boyfriend is a hufflepuff and i find that adorable because he’s this 6ft/buff/serious if he doesn’t know you/russian. 
he...
body:
my boyfriend is a hufflepuff and i find that adorable because he’s this 6ft/buff/serious if he doesn’t know you/russian.

he loves weapons and generally creepy/disturbing videos, and he’s intimidating when you first meet him sometimes because he’s just tall and quiet.


but he’s secretly a shy little softy gumdrop who would cradle cats in his arms for the rest of his days and treats me like a fucking queen.

he once cried while watching a video about a cat with a mobility issue.

he’s that bitch.

summary:
Draco: You wouldn't dare!
Harry: Oh I was dared all right.
Draco: ?
Harry: *kisses Draco*
-
Ron: *from a distance* Harry! We...
body:
Draco: You wouldn't dare!
Harry: Oh I was dared all right.
Draco: ?
Harry: *kisses Draco*
-
Ron: *from a distance* Harry! We only meant a quick kiss, you don't have to- oh, oh okay...
